body:
Royal Court statement  http://en.ammonnews.net/article.aspx?articleNO=11535
Randa's response  http://ammonnews.net/article.aspx?articleNo=79983
AFP's response http://ar.ammannet.net/?p=93164
NYT coverage http://www.nytimes.com/2011/02/12/world/middleeast/12jordan.html?_r=1

http://twitter.com/#!/Tallouza/status/36409551360102400
#AFP Randa Habib : Storm in a teacup: classic case of shooting the messenger...a nauseating show of hypocrisy & posturing #ReformJo #Jo

http://twitter.com/#!/Tzuriekat/status/36356141973766144 Tarek Zureiqat
الكل زعلان من الصحافة اللي غطت بيان ال36 ما حدا بيحكي عاللي وقعوا البيان اصلا #jo
Everyone is angry with the journalist who covered the statement of the 36, and not with those that signed the statement originally

http://twitter.com/#!/batirw/status/36197501698572288
I hope Randa Habib can learn professionalism from this: The View From Jordan http://huff.to/fMNqf6 via @huffingtonpost

http://twitter.com/#!/avinunu/status/36497908471693312
Here's what happens in 2011 when Jordan tries to suppress embarrassing news story by going after journalist: http://t.co/QWEWJXu #ReformJO
